John and Margo Geddie's Homepage. This is our amalgamated family. We live in Houston. John is an attorney and Margo is a stockbroker. Matthew is a technical whiz, a new Boy Scout (having just received the Arrow of Light award) and a Fifth Grader, Sophie is an instrument-rated pilot and a junior at the University of St. Thomas, and Ashley is a sophmore at SMU. (Last updated January 26, 2002)
